attributes.action: Make breaking a manifesto pledge trigger a General Election
attributes.additional_details: Breaking a manifesto pledge essentially means that the Government party has come to power under false pretences, whether intentional or not and must be held accountable.
attributes.background: Make breaking a manifesto pledge trigger a General Election

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Call a general election if a government breaks an election manifesto promise 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744946
